function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to natural conditions in city living","Impact":"Increased stress, reduced well-being, and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporating natural elements like soil plots and green spaces in architectural design","Technologies":"Biophilic design, indoor gardening systems, air purification systems","People":"City dwellers, residents of public housing environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"},{"Description":"Lack of human-centric design in architecture","Impact":"Reduced sense of belonging and security, increased vulnerability in crisis situations","Mitigation":"Developing architecture with a focus on human well-being and safety","Technologies":"Human-centric design principles, crisis-resilient architecture, community-oriented spaces","People":"City dwellers, residents of public housing environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"}]}
